name: DEVILXMUSIC
description: A powerful telegram music streaming Bot !! Powered by @tumhumeyaadnhi

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token of your bot or get it from the @BotFather !!

BOT_USERNAME.description: fill with your bot username from @BotFather but without using '@' symbol

API_ID.description: Enter Your App ID or Get it from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Enter your App hash or get it from my.telegram.org/apps

OWNER_USERNAME.description: fill with your telegram account username without @

SUDO_USERS.description: List the Ids of the SudoUsers of the Bot (separated by space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads (minutes). Don't Change it !!
